comments.comment: Oya kawuruth eka ekata kade yanawa. Wahallu. Meyata kalayak kattiya banna athi wenna. Dan hoda kiyanawa. Kawuru unath thamange paksheta kade yanawanm eya deshapremine ape minissunta. Rishad innawa UNP . HIZBULLAH  innawa pohottuwe. Dalada maligawata bomba gahapu aranthala bikshu gathanaya kala karuna amman innawa pohottuwata. Dan me hamoma deshapremiyo. Mukuth kale nathi werayo. Ane mehemath wahallu. Thamange pakshe waradak penne na. Purudu wenna hama pashema warada pennala denna. 225 epa qwa kalayak. Dan mara gannawa.mun apita adareta me chande illanawa  nemei. Mun bala thanhawata. balayata danayata loba kamata kadara kamata me okkoma karanne. Vigneshwaran eye yapane illim 13 kala. Wasu dewage massinane oya miniha. Thawa mona kathada

comments.comment: Gayanuth chathurika ekka sistam change ekak krala thiyenne.api danne naha oyage fammily life eka.mona unath daruwo dennek samaga thawath gahaniya atharaman karapu kenekne oyath daruwo inna thaththa kenek widiyata thawath gahaniyejta gindarak deepu kebekne.prashna thiyenawa koi pawleth ehemai kiyala daruwo gahanu atha arala thawath kenek ekka deega kana eka unath lankikayo widiyata hary kathai.mafe nam ekama sithiwilla mona amaruwa thibunath kisima gahaniyek daru pawlak inna minihek ganna ekanam maha pawak gewaganna bary papayak.oya duka inne duwekne eyagenma widawanna wenawa.balanna nangith dewars ne.gayange nona hadawThinma widawanawanam athma ganakata pawa gewala iwara karaganna baha chathurikalata .balannko ogollo pawulak winasa karala monatharam akusalayakda kara gaththe kiyala.gahaniya thama hama detama waga kiyanba oni.gayabta dos kiyanna baha.mage nam theerana demawpiyo athara monatharam prashna thibubath daruwo innawaabam daruwanta ammai thaththai laga sitiya uthumai.ithin api kohomada gayanta ejaga wenne?
